titles: Sacrilegious desertion of the holy ministery rebuked,  and tolerated preaching of the gospel vindicated, against the reasonings of a confident questionist, in a book called Toleration not abused; with counsil to the  nonconformists, and petition to the pious conformists / by one that is consecrated to the sacred ministry, and is resolved not to be a deserter of it ...
author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
notes: Written by Richard Baxter. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
keywords: Fullwood, Francis, d. 1693. --  Toleration not to be abused.
